gurmukhi: qiRx B`CI ko Awid bKwnn kIjIAY ] nwiek pd ko qwky pwCy dIjIAY ] S`qRu Sbd ko khIE bhur suDwr kY ] ho nwm qupk ky lIjhu skl ibcwr kY ]768]
transliteration: Trin Bhaachhe Ko Aadh Bakhaanan Keejiai|| Naaik Padk Ko Taake Paachhe Deejeeai|| Shattru Shabad Ko Kaheeo Bahur Sudhaar Kai|| Ho Naam Toupak Ke Leejoh Sakal Bichaar Kai||768||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Tran-bhakshi” and then adding the words “Nayak” and “Satru”, consider all the names of Tupak.768.

gurmukhi: qiRxhw irp ko Awid bKwnn kIjIAY ] nwQ Sbd ko qwNky pwNCy dIjIAY ] S`qRu Sbd ko qwky AMq bKwnIAY ] ho nwm qupk ky skl cqur pihcwnIAY ]769]
transliteration: Trin-haa Ko Aadh Bakhaanan Keejeeai|| Naath Shabad Ko Taanke Paachhe Deejeeai|| Shattru Shabad Ko Taake Ant Bakhaaneeai|| Ho Naam Toupak Ke Sakal Chatur Paihchaaneeai||769||
translation: Mentioning firstly “Tran-haa-ripu”, then adding the words “Naath Shatru”, recognize the names of Tupak.769.

gurmukhi: qiRx irp Awid aucwir kY piq irp AMq aucwr ] sB hI nwm quPMg ky lIjhu suGr suDwr ]770]
transliteration: Trin Rip Aadh Oucdaar(i) Kai Pat(i) Rip Ant Ouchaar|| Sabh Hinaam Touphan Ke Leejoh Soughar Sudhaar||770||
translation: Saying “Tran-ripu” and adding “Pati-ripu” at the end, comprehend correctly all the names of Tupak.770.

gurmukhi: qiRx irp Awid aucwrn kIjY ] qw pwCy nwiek pd dIjY ] S`qRu Sbd ko bhur aucwro ] nwm qupk ky skl ibcwro ]771]
transliteration: Trin Rip Aadh Ouchaaran Keejai|| Taa Paachhe Naaik Pad Deejai|| Shattru Shabad Ko Bahur Oucdaro|| Naam Toupak Ke Sakal Bicdaro||771||
translation: Utter firstly “Tran-ripu” and then add the word “Nayak” and “Shatru”, and in this way consider all the names of Tupak.771.

gurmukhi: BUjwNqk Sbdwid aucwro ] nwiek qw pwCy pd fwro ] S`qRu Sbd ko bhur Bix`jY ] nwm quPMg cIn icq il`jY ]772]
transliteration: Bhoojaantak Shabadaadh Oucdaro|| Naaik Taa Paachhe Pad Daro|| Shattru Shabad Ko Bahur Bhanijjai|| Naam Touphan Cheen Chit Lijjai||772||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Bhujantak” and then adding the words “Nayak” and “Shatru”, recognize the names of Tupak in your mind.772.

gurmukhi: piRQIjwAir Sbdwid aucwro ] qw pwCy nwiek pd fwro ] S`qRu Sbd ko bhur bKwno ] nwm qupk ky sB pihcwno ]773]
transliteration: Prithee-jaa Ar(i) Shabadaad (i) Oucdaro|| Naaik Taa Paachhe Pad Daro|| Shattru Shabad Ko Bahur Bhaakhannd|| Naam Toupak Ke Sabh Paihchaano||773||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Prathvi-jaa-ari” and then uttering the words “Nayak” and “Shatru”, recognize all the names of Tupak.773.

gurmukhi: BU suq irp Sbdwid bKwnn kIjIAY ] qwky pwCy bhur nwQ pd dIjIAY ] S`qRu Sbd ko qwky AMq aucwrIAY ] ho skl qupk ky nwm pRbIn ibcwrIAY ]774]
transliteration: Bhoo Sout Rip Shabadaadh Bakhaanan Keejeeai|| Taake Paachhe Bahur Naath Pad Deejeeai|| Shattru Shabad Ko Taake Ant Oucdareeai|| Ho Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Prabeen Bicdareeai||774||
translation: Comprehend all the names of Tupak by saying the word “Bhu-sut-rup” and then adding the words “Naath Shatru”.774.

gurmukhi: aurivj Sbd su Awid aucwro ] irpnwiek pwCy pd fwro ] S`qRu Sbd ko bhur Bix`jY ] nwm quPMg cIn icq il`jY ]775]
transliteration: Urvij Shabad Su Aadh Oucdaro|| Ripnaaik Paachhe Pad Daro|| Shattru Shabad Ko Bahur Bhanijai|| Naam Touphan Cheen Chit Lijjai||775||
translation: Utter the word “Urvij” and then add “Ripu-nayak”, then speak the word “Shatru” and recognize the names of Tupak.775.

gurmukhi: bYsuMDr jw S`qRu aucwro ] nwiek Sbd AMq dY fwro ] S`qRu Sbd ko bhur aucrIAY ] nwm bMdUk ic`q mY DrIAY ]776]
transliteration: Baisoundhar Jaa Shattru Oucdaro|| Naaik Shabad Ant Dai Daro|| Shattru Shabad Ko Bahur Udareeai|| Naam Bandook Chitt Mai Dareeai||776||
translation: Utter the word “Vasundraa-jaa-Shatru”, then add the words “Nayak” and “Shatru”, know in this way the names of Tupak (Bandook) in your mind.776.

gurmukhi: pUrin Awid aucwrn kIjY ] jw irp pd ko pwCY dIjY ] S`qRu Sbd ko bhur bKwno ] nwm qupk ky skl pCwno ]777]
transliteration: Pooran(i) Aadh Ouchaaran Keejai|| Jaa Rip Pad Ko Paachhai Deejai|| Shattru Shabad Ko Bahur Bakhaano|| Naam Toupak Ke Sakal Pachhaado||777||
translation: Saying the word “Purni”, add the words “Jaa, Ripu and Shatru” and recognize all the names of Tupak.777.
